In his keynote at the DLD Conference in Germany, Google's outgoing chief executive Eric Schmidt announced his company's intent to expand its European presence. Our businesses are doing very well around the globe, and as a result I'm happy to announce we'll be adding 1,000 new employees in Europe and make some significant investments, explained Eric Schmidt .
